author: Justine Calma
title: How to talk with kids about screentime and COVID-19
description: Kids are spending more time online and staring at screens while they’re at home during the COVID-19 pandemic. The Verge spoke with a child psychiatrist about how all that screentime might affect kids and how to talk with them about the novel coronavirus.
content:
Children are definitely aware that were experiencing a crisis.
